course_info.Course Title: Storytelling and Storyboarding with Generative AI
Learning Outcomes: LO1: Use generative AI techniques to develop compelling script elements enriched with narrative structure and creative storytelling.
LO2: Identify effective prompt terms and narrative components to enhance AI-generated storyboards for visual storytelling.
LO3: Utilise generative AI tools to refine video scripts for clarity, tone, and narrative consistency.
LO4: Analyse generative AI outputs for ethical issues, bias, and copyright risks, applying appropriate corrective actions.
course_info.TSC Title: AI Content Generation for Script Development

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: The industry faces challenges in creating engaging and original content that resonates with diverse audiences. There is a tendency towards repetitive and generic storytelling, which fails to capture the audience's interest. Additionally, the integration of new technologies in content creation is often limited, leading to a lack of innovation and creativity.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: This course equips participants with the skills to leverage AI tools for developing unique and compelling narratives. By focusing on creative principles and storytelling techniques, the course encourages the creation of diverse and engaging content. Participants will learn to integrate AI effectively, enhancing both the originality and appeal of their storytelling.
